summary: The relevant epic story of the strong-willed, courageous and independent woman before her time, Kurmanjan, who is revered to this day for her diplomacy for saving her nation from complete destruction when the Russians invaded.
cast: Elina Abai Kyzy|Nasira Mambetova|Aziz Muradillayev|Adilet Usubaliyev|Mirlan Abdulayev|Dinara Abdykadyrova|Nurzinat Abdykadyrova|Dinara Aitikeyeva|Abdykalyk Akmatov|Shaigul Alseitova|Asan Amanov|Azamat Arykov|Talant Asanaliev|Gulnur Asanova|Dyujshen Bajtobetov|Nurdavlet Bakirov|Nurmuhamed Bakirov|Aleksandr Balbekin|Egemberdi Bekboliev|Farkhad Bekmanbetov|Adyl Bolot-Uulu|Leonid Bukhman|Ashir Chokubayev|Asan Chyngyshbaev|Sultan Dikambaev|Sattar Dikambayev|Chorobek Dumanayev|Mederbek Egemberdiev|Maksat Ermenbaev|Aleksandr Golubkov|Denis Gubarenko|Cholpon Idrisova|Alykul Isakov|Kumar Jaliev|Erjan Janenkeev|Ruslan Jumabaev|Ryspek Jumabaev|Ilim Kalmuratov|Aibek Kokeev|Ruslan Kurmanaliyev|Timur Mamatkulov|Nurgul Mamytova|Dmitriy Mitrofanov|Bakyt Mukul|Ermek Mukul|Akylbek Murataliyev|Nurbek Musaev|Omyrbek Nasypbek-Uulu|Ulan Omuraliev|Atai Omurbekov|Erjan Osmonov|Vasiliy Polzunov|Dmitriy Romanchenko|Sadyr Sagonbaiev|Nurlan Salidinov|Nurbek Samatov|Kamchybek Sarybaiev|Jamal Seidakmatova|Temirlan Smanbekov|Jenish Smanov|Ainura Turgunbaeva|Marat Zhanteliyev|Nika Zholdosheva

title: Kurmanjan datka
